attributes.title: Chapter 1: Ruby Rose
attributes.caption: Ruby Rose
attributes.description: The debut episode of the new series RWBY, created by Monty Oum. Music available on iTunes and single "This Will Be the Day"

attributes.title: Chapter 2: The Shining Beacon
attributes.caption: The Shining Beacon
attributes.description: RWBY is a new animated series from Rooster Teeth, directed by Monty Oum. The story focuses on a group of four girls in their first year at a legendary academy where they will learn to fight monsters.
